V Slovenijo prihaja z desetimi tovornjaki
Priljubljeni glasbenik Eros Ramazzotti se k nam vrača v velikem slogu.
04 Nov 2019, 11:22 by G. S.
Legendarni glasbenik, ki prihaja iz sosednje Italije, se v sklopu svetovne turneje vrača v ljubljansko Areno Stožice. Eros Ramazzotti bo 23. novembra znova razvnel slovensko občinstvo in obljublja nepozabno doživetje. V Ljubljano namreč prihaja z lastno produkcijo, ki obsega kar deset tovornih vozil, obiskovalci pa bodo priča vrhunski vizualizaciji s 3D-učinki, posebni odrski konstrukciji in ozvočenju, ki ne bo razočaralo nikogar.Že kot deček, ki je odraščal v rimskem predmestju Cinecitta, je sanjal o glasbeni karieri. Pri sedmih letih je v roke vzel kitaro in se kot statist znašel na filmskih setih, pri čemer je imel ves čas podporo družine. Tudi ko se je prijavil na prvi glasbeni festival Voci Nuove di Castrocaro, in to z lastno pesmijo, je povsem očaral. Nastopu je sledil podpis za snemanje prve plošče. Leta 1982 je izdal prvi singel An un amico, dve leti pozneje pa je zmagal na svetovno znanem glasbenem festivalu San Remo. Že pri izdaji prvega albuma Cuori Agitati so bile vse pesmi posnete tako v italijanščini kot španščini, kar nadaljuje še danes.Deset let po izdaji prvega singla je Ramazzoti postal svetovno znan. Z izdajo albuma Dove c’e Musica, ki ga je produciral sam, je dosegel neverjeten uspeh, saj je prepričal sedem milijonov poslušalcev, ki so kupili njegov album. Sodelovanje z legendarno Tino Turner in drugimi znanimi imeni je njegov status vsestranskega umetnika in svetovne senzacije le potrdilo. A če bi ga želeli opisati z besedo zvezdnik, bi mu storili krivico, saj ta beseda ne označuje razsežnosti svetovnega uspeha te karizmatične osebnosti. Ramazzotti je nesporna sila narave, ki tudi 30 let po prvem izdanem singlu in po 50 milijonih prodanih albumov še vedno dodaja nova poglavja k svoji neverjetni zgodbi. Ena takšnih se obeta 23. novembra, ko bodo na svoj račun lahko prišli vsi oboževalci popa in rocka s pridihom italijanskega melosa.
text:
He comes to Slovenia with ten trucks
Popular musician Eros Ramazzotti is coming back to us in great style.
04 Nov 2019, 11:22 by G.S.
The legendary musician, who hails from neighboring Italy, is returning to the Stozice Arena in Ljubljana as part of a world tour. On November 23, Eros Ramazzotti will reawaken the Slovene audience and it promises an unforgettable experience. Namely, he comes to Ljubljana with his own production, comprising as many as ten trucks, and visitors will witness superb visualization with 3D effects, special stage construction and sound system that will not disappoint anyone. Already as a boy growing up in the Roman suburb of Cinecitt, dreamed of a music career. At the age of seven, he picked up a guitar and found himself on film sets as a statistician, with all the support of his family. Even when he applied to the first Voci Nuove di Castrocaro music festival, and with his own song, he was absolutely fascinated. The performance was followed by a signature to record the first record. In 1982 he released his first single, An un amico, and two years later he won the world-renowned San Remo Music Festival. Already with the release of Cuori Agitati's first album, all the songs were recorded in both Italian and Spanish, which continues to this day. Twenty years after the release of the first single, Ramazzoti became world famous. His self-produced Dove c'e Musica album has produced incredible success, convincing the seven million listeners who have purchased his album. Working with the legendary Tina Turner and other famous names, his status as a versatile artist and worldwide sensation is just a testament. But if you wanted to describe him with the word superstar, you would do him wrong, because that word does not indicate the magnitude of the worldwide success of this charismatic personality. Ramazzotti is the undisputed force of nature, which even 30 years after the first single was released and after 50 million albums sold, is still adding new chapters to its incredible story. One of these promises on November 23, when all fans of pop and rock with a touch of Italian melos can come to their own expense.
